availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen Templeton Shea (Carroll Co. brick mason)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, brick mason. Hamilton County, Ohio, native. Son of Charles Shea and Catherine Shea. Married Harriet Shea. Father of Anne M. Shea and Susan Shea. Brick mason in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Brick mason in Carroll County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District No. 1, p. 49. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 2, p. 42. Find A Grave, "Allen Templeton Shea (1823 - 1911)," Memorial #135618849, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=135618849 (accessed May 18, 2017).
